root.name: Questprobe Featuring Human Torch and the Thing
root.description: Introduction This third quest probe adventure has you taking control of the heroes Human Torch and The Thing. The player switches between the two characters in the adventure. They are tasked with rescuing Alicia Masters from Dr Doom's Castle in Latveria. Other infoIt was originally intended to be followed up by a fourth adventure featuring the X-Men, but this was never published. Although you may find it downloadable on the web somewhere.

similar_games.game: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
